sentences.en: His own books and memoirs are a farrago of half-truth and out-right invention.
sentences.cn: 他自己的那些书和回忆录都是掺杂着半真半假的叙述和彻头彻尾的编造的大杂烩。

sentences.en: Owen was listening to this pitiable farrago with feelings of contempt and wonder.
sentences.cn: 欧文带着轻蔑而又好奇的心情听着这一派胡言.

sentences.en: What a farrago of old fables is this!
sentences.cn: 这一套全是古代的寓言七拼八凑起来的!
